upload.dirDescription:
This feature is only supported by chromium-based browser.
 In this mode, uploading must be done using drag-and-drop. The selection dialog when clicking is deactivated.
 Empty folders are created using marker files (.scmkeep).

errors.leadingSlash: The folder path must not start with a "/"
errors.empty: The folder path must not be empty

B0Skx4uOG1.description: The given path is no directory and therefore has not been deleted.
